tasks.label: build and run
tasks.command: echo '--------------------> Compiling main.exe...' && g++ -std=c++11 -Wall -Wextra -Wformat -Wdouble-promotion -Wchkp -Wpedantic main.cpp -o main.exe -DDEBUG -DUSE_STDOUT && echo '--------------------> Compiled' && echo '--------------------> Running main.exe...' && ./main.exe || echo '--------------------> Return value: '$?

tasks.label: run
tasks.command: echo '--------------------> Running main.exe...' && ./main.exe || echo '--------------------> Return value: '$?
